meanings.sent1: I always presorted my laundry before washing it.
meanings.sent2: The mail was presorted by zip code for faster delivery.
meanings.sent3: Before the big trip, I presorted my snacks into different bags.
meanings.sent4: She presorted her thoughts before the important presentation.
meanings.sent5: Presorting the recycling made the task much easier.

meanings.sent1: The presorted documents were ready for filing.
meanings.sent2: We received a presorted list of attendees for the event.
meanings.sent3: The presorted puzzle pieces made completing it a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her presorted wardrobe made getting dressed quick and easy.
meanings.sent5: The presorted groceries saved time at the checkout counter.
